trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegment"></xref> objects that can be individually accessed by index.
trans-unit.target: 表示一套<xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegment"></xref>可按照索引单独访问的对象。

trans-unit.source: Except as noted, members of this class behave exactly as described by the <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IList%601>, <xref:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection%601>, and <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> documentation.
trans-unit.target: 但如所述，此类的成员的行为如下所述完全<xref:System.Collections.Generic.IList%601>， <xref:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection%601>，和<xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601>文档。</xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> </xref:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection%601> </xref:System.Collections.Generic.IList%601>

trans-unit.source: **Freezable Features:** Because it inherits from the <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> class, the PathSegmentCollection class provides several special features: PathSegmentCollection objects can be declared as , shared among multiple objects, made read-only to improve performance, cloned, and made thread-safe.
trans-unit.target: **可冻结功能︰**从继承，因此<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>类，PathSegmentCollection 类提供了一些特殊功能︰ 可以声明为在多个对象之间共享、 进行只读的以提高性能、 进行线程安全 PathSegmentCollection 对象和克隆，。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For more information about the different features provided by <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects, see the [Freezable Objects Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关提供的不同功能的详细信息<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象，请参阅[可冻结对象概述](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.target: # # XAML 隐式集合用法``` ``` # # XAML 值*oneOrMorePathSegmentObjectElements*一个或多个对象，使用对象元素语法声明。

trans-unit.target: collectionis .

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection"></xref> class with the specified capacity, or the number of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegment"></xref> objects the collection is initially capable of storing.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection"></xref>类指定的容量或数<xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegment"></xref>对象最初可存储的集合。

trans-unit.target: 数<xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegment"></xref>对象集合最初能够存储。

trans-unit.source: Adds a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegment"></xref> to the end of the collection.
trans-unit.target: 将添加<xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegment"></xref>到集合的末尾。

trans-unit.source: Because <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegment> objects derive from <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>, they are copied when they are used.
trans-unit.target: 因为<xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegment>对象派生自<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>，使用它们时都将复制它们。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegment>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, you might not be able to later retrieve or remove the <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegment> you added to the collection using the original <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegment> object; the <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegment> in the collection is a copy of the original <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegment> and is considered a different <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegment> than the one you added.
trans-unit.target: 因此，你可能不能以后检索或删除<xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegment>添加到集合使用原始<xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegment>对象;<xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegment>集合中是一份原始<xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegment>和被认为是不同<xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegment>比你添加的一个。</xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegment> </xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegment> </xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegment> </xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegment> </xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegment>

trans-unit.source: Unlike typical implementations of <xref:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection%601.Add%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, this implementation throws an <xref:System.ArgumentException> if you attempt to add a **null** (**Nothing**) reference.
trans-unit.target: 与不同的典型实现<xref:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection%601.Add%2A?displayProperty=fullName>，此实现引发<xref:System.ArgumentException>如果你尝试添加**null** (**执行任何操作**) 引用。</xref:System.ArgumentException> </xref:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection%601.Add%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection"></xref>, making deep copies of this object's values.
trans-unit.target: 创建的可修改复本<xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection"> </xref>，从而深度复制此对象的值。

trans-unit.source: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: 在复制依赖项属性时，此方法会复制资源引用和数据绑定 （但可能不再解析），但不是动画或其当前值。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于生成的可修改副本冻结<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象)。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 当前对象的可修改复本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>

trans-unit.source: The array into which the collection's items are to be copied.
trans-unit.target: 集合的项复制到数组。

trans-unit.source: The index of `array` at which to start copying the contents of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection"></xref>.

trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Returns an enumerator that can iterate through the collection.
trans-unit.target: 返回可循环访问集合的枚举。

trans-unit.source: Enumerators only allow reading the data in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 枚举器只允许读取集合中的数据。

trans-unit.source: Enumerators cannot be used to modify the underlying collection.
trans-unit.target: 枚举器不能用于修改基础集合。

trans-unit.source: Initially, the enumerator is positioned before the first item in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 最初，枚举数定位在集合中的第一项之前。

trans-unit.source: also brings the enumerator back to this position.
trans-unit.target: 此外会回此位置的枚举数。

trans-unit.source: At this position, calling <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.Current%2A> throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: 在此位置，调用<xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.Current%2A>引发异常。</xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.Current%2A>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, you must call <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.MoveNext%2A> to advance the enumerator to the first item of the collection before reading the value of <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.Current%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 因此，你必须调用<xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.MoveNext%2A>到集合，然后再读取<xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.Current%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.Current%2A>的值的第一项枚举器向前移动</xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.MoveNext%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.Current%2A> returns the same object until either <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.MoveNext%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.Reset%2A> is called.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.Current%2A>返回相同的对象之前<xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.MoveNext%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.Reset%2A>称为。</xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.Reset%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.MoveNext%2A></xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.Current%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.MoveNext%2A> sets <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.Current%2A> to the next item.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.MoveNext%2A>设置<xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.Current%2A>至下一项。</xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.Current%2A></xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.MoveNext%2A>

trans-unit.source: After the end of the collection is passed, the enumerator is positioned after the last item in the collection, and calling <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.MoveNext%2A> returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: 该枚举数传递到集合的末尾之后，将放后的最后一项在集合中，且调用<xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.MoveNext%2A>返回`false`。</xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.MoveNext%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the last call to <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.MoveNext%2A> returned `false`, calling <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.Current%2A> throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果最后一次调用到<xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.MoveNext%2A>返回`false`，则调用<xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.Current%2A>引发异常。</xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.Current%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.MoveNext%2A>

trans-unit.source: To set <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.Current%2A> to the first item of the collection again, you can call <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.Reset%2A> followed by <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.MoveNext%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要设置<xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.Current%2A>到再次，集合的第一项可以调用<xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.Reset%2A>后, 跟<xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.MoveNext%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.MoveNext%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.Reset%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.Current%2A>

trans-unit.source: An enumerator remains valid as long as the collection remains unchanged.
trans-unit.target: 只要集合保持不变，枚举数就保持有效。

trans-unit.source: If changes are made to the collection, such as adding, modifying or deleting items, the enumerator is irrecoverably invalidated and the next call to <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.MoveNext%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.Reset%2A> throws an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>.
trans-unit.target: 如果更改到集合，如添加、 修改或删除项，则枚举数将失效且不可恢复，并且下次调用<xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.MoveNext%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.Reset%2A>引发<xref:System.InvalidOperationException>.</xref:System.InvalidOperationException></xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.Reset%2A></xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.MoveNext%2A>到

trans-unit.source: If the collection is modified between <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.MoveNext%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.Current%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.Current%2A> will return the item that it is set to, even if the enumerator is already invalidated.
trans-unit.target: 如果之间修改集合<xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.MoveNext%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.Current%2A>，<xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.Current%2A>将返回到，设置的项，即使枚举数已经无效。</xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.Current%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.Current%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator.MoveNext%2A>

trans-unit.source: The enumerator does not have exclusive access to the collection; therefore, enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure.
trans-unit.target: 枚举数没有对集合; 独占访问权因此，枚举整个集合本质上不是一个线程安全的过程。

trans-unit.source: Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads could still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: 即使某个集合已同步，其他线程仍可以修改集合，这会导致枚举数引发异常。

trans-unit.source: To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads.
trans-unit.target: 若要确保枚举过程中的线程安全性，可以在整个枚举期间锁定集合，或者捕获由其他线程进行的更改导致的异常。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator> that can iterate through the collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator>可以循环访问集合。</xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection.Enumerator>

trans-unit.source: Returns the index of the first occurrence of the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegment"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 返回指定的第一个匹配项的索引<xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegment"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The item to search for.
trans-unit.target: 要搜索的项。

trans-unit.source: Inserts a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegment"></xref> into this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection"></xref> at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 将插入<xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegment"></xref>到此<xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegmentCollection"></xref>的指定索引处。

trans-unit.source: Unlike typical implementations of <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IList%601.Insert%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, this implementation throws an <xref:System.ArgumentException> if you attempt to insert a **null** (**Nothing**) reference.
trans-unit.target: 与不同的典型实现<xref:System.Collections.Generic.IList%601.Insert%2A?displayProperty=fullName>，此实现引发<xref:System.ArgumentException>如果你尝试插入**null** (**执行任何操作**) 引用。</xref:System.ArgumentException> </xref:System.Collections.Generic.IList%601.Insert%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The index at which to insert `value`, the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegment"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 在其中插入索引`value`，指定<xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegment"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The item to insert.
trans-unit.target: 要插入的项。

trans-unit.target: index不是中的有效索引 。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegment"></xref> at the specified zero-based index.

trans-unit.source: Unlike typical implementations of <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IList%601.Item%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, this implementation throws an <xref:System.ArgumentException> if you attempt to insert a **null** (**Nothing**) reference.
